projects.description: This is the very first project I have submitted during the techdegree. The goal of this project was to create a working button that would generate a random quote teach time it was clicked. Each quote object contained a maximum of 4 properties.
The goal of the second project was to create pagination buttons that would display another set of students that were generated from a provided database.
During this course, I learned how to use regex as a tool to validate forms. I also worked with a lot of conditional statements in order to make the form more interactive.

projects.project_name: Project 4: Object Oriented Programming, Game Application
projects.description: I learned object oriented programming and incorporated my knowledge of it by creating my own objects that contains methods and data that can then be called by other objects
I learned asynchronous programming by using data provided by an API and creating a directory that randomized 12 users each time.
